parse.title: List of Ramsar sites in Albania

text.*:
This is a list of wetlands in Albania which are designated by the Ramsar Convention as sites of international importance. Currently, Albania has 4 sites designated as Wetlands of International Importance, with a total surface area of 98,181 ha (981.81 km2).[1]

Map all coordinates using: OpenStreetMap 
Download coordinates as: KML · GPX

List of Ramsar Sites in Albania[edit]

Name Image Designated Area District Location
Lake Prespa
Liqeni i Prespës		 2013 15,119 hectares (151.19 km2)[2] Korçë District
Karavasta Lagoon
Laguna e Karavastasë		 1994 20,000 hectares (200 km2) Fier District

See also[edit]

Wikimedia Commons has media related to Lagoons of Albania.
  • Protected areas of Albania
  • Geography of Albania
  • Lagoons of Albania
  • Lakes of Albania

References[edit]

  1. ^ Ramsar Convention (3 July 2013). "The Annotated Ramsar List: Albania". archive.ramsar.org. 
  2. ^ Ramsar Convention (3 July 2013). "Albania adds its parts of the Prespa Lakes to the Ramsar List". ramsar.org.
